alath dolath gala yanne karamin saradam gasuth waluth bala inne dewamin awaman mulu lokema ayi karanne mehema napurukam ala dola gahakola danne da ape manussakam pada rachanaya - samudra weththasinha punchi pataw perahare enawa eedangu mankada thiththa pataw rala punchi depa ekathana randuna muthu ahindiyi madatiya gale gini maddahane kusagini nodani ohuta muwawi pasal yanne ma dayi nikamata mata hithuna ma oba - oba ma langa inna neth sarin pamani hamu wuye ee aath bawehi hada bandune senehase sonduru bawa pirune madhu sanda tharu ada hamuwila sitiyada oba ma lan wila thibu sonduru sene ganga sindila gayanaya - bandara athawuda pada rachanaya - jayalath manorathna pe්ramaye ruduru bawa eyayi...

siddhiyata adala kanthawa sambandhayenda ayage nithignyayan adhikaranayen apa illimak sidu kala athara kanthawa bag miladi ganimata adalawa wyaja lesa sakas kala risitpath merata eksath arabi emir rajya thanapathi karyalayata idiripath kirima, thanapathi karyalaya labadun mudalin niyamitha pasal bag pramanayata wada aduwen miladi ganima yana karunu salaka saha ee sambandhayen thawama wimarshana pawathwima matha wimarshanawalata badha athiwimata hakiyawak thibima matha elesa ayage apa illima mahesthrathwariya prathikshepa kerini.

yatath wijitha wahal bhawayata erehiwa lankika dhanapathi panthiya pawathwagena giya atharamadi samayata erehiwa saba nidahasa dina ganimatath, ee osse lankiya siyalu jana kotas athara samagiya wardhanaya kirimatath ee wana wita durwala kota asanwidhanathmakawa pawathi kamkaru panthiyata wishwasaniya diyunu nayakathwayak sapayimath, podu janathawage wishwasaya dina gath pulul bahujana wyaparayak bawata pathwimatath yana karunu ehi di mulika wu athara emangin lankika samajawadi wiplawaya udesa peramunu balaaniyaka karyabharaya itu kirimata eyata pawari thibini.

rupiyal agaya ( 17/02/2011 huwamaru agaya matha ) :
apa aayathanaya eda wagema adath mul andum nirmana kshethraye ihalinma wajambaenne kisima witeka mudal wishesha karagena sewawan sidu nowunu nisayi.
purathanayedi mema chaithyaya "shilasobana kantaka chaithyaya" lesinda hadunwa atha.
ee nisa rajaya me wana wita uthure paripalana katayuthu widhimathwa karagena yanawa.

katakathawe sandahan ‘chodanawata‘ ayage sambandhaya kumak wuwa da, emagin thamanta ath wana apahasuthawaya sambandhayen prathikarma apekshawen giya thana yukthiya wenuwata itu wanne mewani ‘rajakariyak‘ nam ee thawath kathawaki.
ane saho thuwen kotasa ada denawa neda?
punarin yanu wishala wagurubim, katulahab, mukalan, erum, diya agal, ganga, loku  kuda waw, ha hunugal sahitha wallen da samanwitha bahu - ru sahitha bhu - kalapayeki.
godak ma wadagath lipiyak….
enam rawana yugayedi adhiaarakshitha kalapayak lesa mema pradeshaya pawathuni.
kohe hari kampas ekaka goriyak giyoth ape kollo dannawa amma pahuwenida enawa kiyala.
obath samanga obe sande lidar- irudina panapitin walalu bawa.

barukda owunta asenta kiyewuweya. 16 thawada owhu ee siyalu wachana asa, bhayin yukthawa, ekineka desata hari: api me siyalu wachana sabawin rajuta danwannemuyayi barukta kiwoya. 17 thawada owhu: numbaa ohuge mukhayen asa me siyalu wachana liyuwe kohomadayi apata danwannayi kiya barukgen asuwoya. 18 baruk uththarademin: ohu me siyalu wachana thamage mukhayenma mata kiyadunneya, mamada thinthen pothehi liwimiyi kiweya. 19 ewita adhipathihu: numbaala kothana sitinawada kiya kisiweku dana noganna lesa numbaath yeremiyath gos sangawi innayi barukta kiwoya. 20 owhu elishama lekamage athul geyi potha thaba maluwata raju langata gos raju asa sitiyadi ee siyalu wachana kiwoya. 21 raja theme potha genenta yehudi yawiya.
